name: Rabble-Rouser
description:
A game made by Macadthosh and I during a month long in person game jam a long while ago. I did the programming, while Macadthosh did the art and music selection.

Avoid the thrown objects, canes, and rats for three rounds.

The game is based on a 1920s or 1930s aesthetic.

Controls are WASD.

The music that plays during gameplay is Ain't Misbehavin' by Fats Waller.
